description: Sindhupalchowk was one of the districts severely affected by the 2015 Nepal earthquake. The devastation was extensive, with numerous casualties and widespread damage to infrastructure and cultural heritage sites.

historical_events.event_description: Sindhupalchowk was one of the districts severely affected by the 2015 Nepal earthquake. The devastation was extensive, with numerous casualties and widespread damage to infrastructure and cultural heritage sites.
historical_events.event_significance: The earthquake caused massive destruction in Sindhupalchowk, leading to significant loss of life and damage to cultural heritage sites.
